data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fachin, Diego Aguilar (2015): A new species of the rare Neotropical genus Auloceromyia Lindner, 1969 (Diptera: Stratiomyidae) and the first record of the male of A. pedunculata Pimentel & Pujol-Luz, 2000. Zootaxa 4020 (3): 554-570, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4020.3.8
